pageContext.claim: “A lot of things are happening. Attorney General Jeff Sessions. [Health and Human Services] Secretary Alex Azar, who's really setting the world on fire now with your lowering of prescription drug prices and a lot of other things you're doing, and we appreciate it very much. A lot of people are seeing it, already, what's happening.”
pageContext.analysis: Prescription drug prices are rising rapidly, 6.3 percent in 2018, the fastest annual growth over the next decade, according to the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services.
